sentences.sContent: I have a bookcase in the room.
sentences.sContent_eng: I have a bookcase in the room.
sentences.sCn: 我有一个书架在房间里。

sentences.sContent: There are many interesting book in our bookcase.
sentences.sContent_eng: There are many interesting book in our bookcase.
sentences.sCn: 有很多有趣的书在我们的书架。

sentences.sContent: Dear children, what would you feel if you have a talking bookcase in your room?
sentences.sContent_eng: Dear children, what would you feel if you have a talking bookcase in your room?
sentences.sCn: 亲爱的孩子们，如果你的房间里有一架会说话的书柜如何？

remMethod.val: book(书)+case(容器)→装书的容器→书柜， 书架

trans.tranOther: a piece of furniture with shelves to hold books
